mapper.select: select SID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSKU, EBAYCATEGORYID, EBAYCATEGORYNAME, EBAYUSERID, EBAYSHOPID, HITCOUNT, EBAYSTARTTIMESTR, NUMODA, EBAYMONEYTYPE, EBAYBUYITNEWPRICE, SELLOPER, QUANTITYSOLD1, QUANTITYSOLD7, QUANTITYSOLD14, QUANTITYSOLD21, QUANTITYSOLD28, QUANTITYSOLD56, QUANTITYSOLD, QUANTITYSOLDAVG, HITCOUNT1, HITCOUNT7, HITCOUNT14, HITCOUNT21, HITCOUNT28, HITCOUNT56, CORPID, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, FLAG, EBAYTITLE, EBAYSHOPNAME, EBAYLOCATION, EBAYGALLERYURL from db_salesdata where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSKU, EBAYCATEGORYID, EBAYCATEGORYNAME, EBAYUSERID, EBAYSHOPID, HITCOUNT, EBAYSTARTTIMESTR, NUMODA, EBAYMONEYTYPE, EBAYBUYITNEWPRICE, SELLOPER, QUANTITYSOLD1, QUANTITYSOLD7, QUANTITYSOLD14, QUANTITYSOLD21, QUANTITYSOLD28, QUANTITYSOLD56, QUANTITYSOLD, QUANTITYSOLDAVG, HITCOUNT1, HITCOUNT7, HITCOUNT14, HITCOUNT21, HITCOUNT28, HITCOUNT56, CORPID, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, FLAG, EBAYTITLE, EBAYSHOPNAME, EBAYLOCATION, EBAYGALLERYURL from db_salesdata

EBAYITEMID = #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYSKU = #{ebaysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

EBAYUSERID = #{ebayuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYSHOPID = #{ebayshopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
HITCOUNT = #{hitcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EBAYSTARTTIMESTR = #{ebaystarttimestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NUMODA = #{numoda,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYMONEYTYPE = #{ebaymoneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYBUYITNEWPRICE = #{ebaybuyitnewprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLOPER = #{selloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
QUANTITYSOLD1 = #{quantitysold1,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLD7 = #{quantitysold7,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLD14 = #{quantitysold14,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLD21 = #{quantitysold21,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLD28 = #{quantitysold28,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLD56 = #{quantitysold56,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLD = #{quantitysold,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
QUANTITYSOLDAVG = #{quantitysoldavg,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HITCOUNT1 = #{hitcount1,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HITCOUNT7 = #{hitcount7,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HITCOUNT14 = #{hitcount14,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HITCOUNT21 = #{hitcount21,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HITCOUNT28 = #{hitcount28,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HITCOUNT56 = #{hitcount56,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EBAYTITLE = #{ebaytitle,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
EBAYSHOPNAME = #{ebayshopname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
EBAYLOCATION = #{ebaylocation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
EBAYGALLERYURL = #{ebaygalleryurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
